Articles.Content:
Hello, guys and girls of the internet, I am Rocket_Man1234 and I need your help to make ideas for my Kerbal X page. As of late I've been running out of ideas and have been struggling to get inspiration from the simple Google search of "Jet" or "Plane" so, I need you to find an aircraft or rocket you would like me to build then I will post the craft.  Thank you for reading this and happy flying

 

https://kerbalx.com/Rocket_man1234
